# Get the source: For this download, you may have to wait several seconds until it starts downloading...
wget https://sourceforge.net/projects/libjpeg/files/libjpeg/6b/jpegsrc.v6b.tar.gz/download
mv download jpegsrc.v6b.tar.gz
tar xvf jpegsrc.v6b.tar.gz
rm jpegsrc.v6b.tar.gz

# Compile:
cd jpeg-6b
./configure
make -j6

# STATIC LIB IS IN:
./libjpeg.a
